00030 /*
00031  * This class describes a grid.
00032  * This grid can be draw on the screen or not.
00033  * It defines, for example, the relative position of 2 points of measure.
00034  */
00035 class Grid
00036 {
00037  public:
00038   Grid (void)
00039   {
00040     set_x_min(0);
00041     set_x_max(300);
00042     set_x_space(10);
00043     
00044     set_y_min(0);
00045     set_y_max(300);
00046     set_y_space(10);
00047     
00048     set_z_min(0);
00049     set_z_max(0);
00050     set_z_space(0);
00051     
00052     set_visible();
00053     //unset_visible();
00054     //set_vibible(true);
00055   }
00056   
00057   Grid(double const x_min, double const x_max, double const x_space,
00058        double const y_min, double const y_max, double const y_space,
00059        double const z_min, double const z_max, double const z_space,
00060        bool const visible )
00061     {
00062       set_x_min(x_min);
00063       set_x_max(x_max);
00064       set_x_space(x_space);
00065 
00066       set_y_min(y_min);
00067       set_y_max(y_max);
00068       set_y_space(y_space);
00069 
00070       set_z_min(z_min);
00071       set_z_max(z_max);
00072       set_z_space(z_space);
00073 
00074       set_visible(visible);
00075     }
00076 
00077   void Draw(wxWindowDC *dc);
